title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
cooking_instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated Parmesan cheese. Fry pancetta until crispy. Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta, then remove from heat and mix in egg-cheese mixture. Stir vigorously to create a creamy sauce. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
cooking_instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour. Grill or pan-sear until cooked through. In a separate pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger, then add tomato puree, cream, and spices. Simmer until thickened. Add grilled chicken and cook for 10–15 minutes. Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: A quick Asian-style dish featuring tender beef strips sautéed with vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.
cooking_instructions: Slice beef thinly against the grain. Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Sauté garlic and ginger, add beef and cook until browned. Add sliced vegetables such as bell peppers and broccoli. Stir in soy sauce and a splash of sesame oil. Cook for 3–5 minutes and serve over rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A traditional Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
cooking_instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly. Add slices of fresh mozzarella. Bake for 10–12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbling. Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A crisp salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing.
cooking_instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce. Prepare dressing by mixing mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, anchovy paste, and Parmesan. Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons, and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese. Serve chilled.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
summary: A flavorful rice dish stir-fried with mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and scrambled eggs.
cooking_instructions: Heat oil in a wok. Scramble eggs and set aside. Sauté garlic, carrots, peas, and bell peppers. Add cooked rice and stir well. Pour in soy sauce and mix thoroughly. Return scrambled eggs to the pan and cook for another 2–3 minutes before serving.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: A healthy and flavorful seafood dish seasoned and grilled to perfection.
cooking_instructions: Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and olive oil. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill salmon skin-side down for 4–6 minutes per side until flaky and cooked through. Serve with vegetables or rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: A Mexican-inspired dish consisting of seasoned ground beef served in crispy or soft tortillas with fresh toppings.
cooking_instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet and drain excess fat. Add taco seasoning and a small amount of water; simmer for 5 minutes. Warm tortillas. Fill with seasoned beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and salsa before serving.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: A creamy Italian rice dish slowly cooked with broth and sautéed mushrooms.
cooking_instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter. Add Arborio rice and toast lightly. Pour in white wine and cook until absorbed. Gradually add warm broth, stirring continuously until rice is creamy and tender. Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve warm.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy breakfast cakes made from a simple batter of flour, eggs, milk, and baking powder.
cooking_instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, eggs, and melted butter into a smooth batter. Heat a lightly greased pan over medium heat. Pour batter and cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy baked dessert squares made with cocoa and chocolate.
cooking_instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Melt butter and mix with sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Stir in cocoa powder, flour, and salt. Pour batter into a greased baking pan and bake for 20–25 minutes. Let cool before slicing.
